definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: It is not unusual to produce an excellent quality dog from an outbred litter.
sentences.chinese: 從遠緣繁殖中產生一品質極佳的狗並非不尋常的事情。

sentences.english: Distant hybridization is one of the most important breeding methods in modern vegetable science.
sentences.chinese: 遠緣雜交是現代蔬菜作物品種改良的重要手段之一。

sentences.english: This paper reported the first results of ovule culture in beet wide hybridization.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次報告了甜菜遠緣雜交胚珠培養的結果。

sentences.english: Wide hybridization is a most widely used technique in crop breeding programs.
sentences.chinese: 植物遠緣雜交是作物育種中廣泛應用的技術。

sentences.english: The result is short, wide crosses overlapping tall, narrow crosses.
sentences.chinese: 後果是短創立，遠緣雜交堆疊高，狹隘的十字架。
